# Pull Request Template

### Description
Describe the changes made to the project. Indicate which features were added, fixed, or improved.

---

### Checklist before submitting a Pull Request:

- [ ] **I have tested the project on a virtual machine or PC**. Was the .iso file downloaded and ran successfully?
- [ ] **I have not removed or modified any important files** that could affect the project's build or functionality.
- [ ] **I have run all necessary tests** to ensure that the changes do not break the current project.
- [ ] **All new features and changes are documented**, where necessary.
- [ ] **I have added tests** for new functionality (if necessary).
- [ ] **I have verified that all existing tests pass**.
- [ ] **I have not left unnecessary comments or debug output** in the code. - [ ] **I have updated the documentation** (if required by the changes).
- [ ] **My code complies with the project's coding standards**.
- [ ] **I have indicated that the project license is MIT** and have not added any license restrictions to the changes.

---

### License Check

- [ ] **I have verified that my changes comply with the MIT License**. I have not added any licenses incompatible with the MIT License.

---

### Additional Information

If you have any additional comments or clarifications, please include them here.

---

### Related Issues

If your pull request is related to a specific issue or bug, please include it below with a link:

- Fixes #[issue number]
- Closes #[issue number]

---

### Screenshots (if applicable)

If your change includes visual changes or a new interface, please include screenshots to help reviewers understand what has changed.
